segments.text: I hear that you've got a chance to go to Europe for a half-year training program . Is it true ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'm leaving on the 14th of next month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Congratulations ! How can you get such a good opportunity to be trained overseas ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , it is a policy in my company . The human resources management department has connections overseas this year , so we can receive training there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How nice ! But will you have to pay for the training ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . The company pays for everything . Doesn't this sound very attractive ? This is why our company can always get the best employees !
segments.speaker: S2
